ai-patthana19.13:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: One whatever is suitable for the three times of the Dhamma
ai-patthana19.13:1.1_0: Not having arisen in the Dhamma, (of the Saṅgha) is a condition for the sake of (good) present,
ai-patthana19.13:1.1_1: not the cause or condition for the sake of thoughts that have arisen (in accordance) with the Teaching.
ai-patthana19.13:1.1_2: and thoughts that have arisen, nor are the causes and conditions for the sake of the Dhamma -
ai-patthana19.13:1.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana19.13:2.1_0: for the sake of three objects, three trees have been reborn in the realm of Yet. ...
ai-patthana19.13:2.1_1: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
